greeting.text: Hey there! I'm Jordan, the project manager. Always busy with sprints and deadlines! Need something?

project-status.text: We're making good progress! A few blockers here and there, but the team is crushing it. Check out the kanban board to see the current sprint status!

kanban-location.text: The kanban terminal is right here in the office! You can view tasks, create new ones, or update existing work items. It's our command center!
